Player History
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis on 7/27/1990 (Going to STL: P Dave Mlicki, P Pedro Borbon. Going to DET: 3B Bob Horner)...
Traded from St. Louis to New York (M) on 4/11/1993 (Going to NYM: P Pedro Borbon. Going to STL: P Scott Garrelts)...
